Introduction
This topic contains information on death gratuity certificates sent to service departments, including
definition of imminent death
jurisdiction for
imminent death cases
, and
non-imminent death cases
, and
contacting the Cleveland Regional Office (RO) about death gratuity claims
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4  - Issuing Death Gratuity Certificates to Service Departments
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section None
